RWAForm.title: RWA Digitalization & Tokenization Project Information Form
RWAForm.subtitle: Comprehensive Services for Real World Assets (RWA) Digitalization and Tokenization
RWAForm.processDescription: Phase 1: Consulting & Legal Structure Design → Phase 2: Technical Development & Tokenization → Phase 3: Token Issuance & Listing → Phase 4: On-chain Asset Management & Ongoing Services

companyName.label: Company Name or Individual Name
companyName.placeholder: Please enter the complete company name as shown on business license
companyName.required: Please enter company name or individual name

legalPerson.label: Legal Representative or Person in Charge
legalPerson.required: Please enter legal representative or person in charge

email.label: Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

businessLicense.label: Business License Number/Unified Social Credit Code

assetInfo.title: RWA Asset Detailed Information
assetInfo.description: Please provide detailed information about your real-world assets. This information will be used for asset assessment, compliance governance, ownership verification, and value evaluation in the preliminary work.

options.real_estate_commercial: Commercial Real Estate (Office Buildings, Shopping Malls, Hotels, etc.)
options.energy_renewable: Renewable Energy (Wind Power, Solar Power, etc.)
options.financial: Financial Assets (Debt Rights, Income Rights, etc.)

assetSubtype.label: Asset Subtype Details
assetSubtype.placeholder: e.g., Specific Highway Section, Commercial Complex, Solar Power Station, etc.

assetDescription.label: Detailed Asset Description
assetDescription.placeholder: Please describe the asset's location, scale, operational status, revenue model, market position, etc.

RWAForm.securityNote: Information Security Commitment: We commit to strictly protecting all information you provide, using it only for project evaluation and solution design. All materials will be handled according to confidentiality agreement requirements.

submit.description: After submission, our professional team will contact you within 24 hours for initial project evaluation

message.error: Submission failed, please try again later

stepValidation.error: Please fill in all required fields
stepValidation.info: Please submit at the final step

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
